description: Breaking so many blocks take entirely too long? Fine, I'll tell you a little trick to break blocks so much quicker.

You know that grave symbol ( ` ) near your fingers, most likely not far from your left pinky? Well, if you concentrate really hard to press it while you mine, it'll break a lot of blocks! Be wary, because this shortens mining time but does not free your mining efforts of food or tool durability costs.

If you don't like this default symbol, you can always change it in your mind. When I first was amalgamated, this symbol and more were referred to as "key binds". This one specifically is called --FTB Ultimine.--
